item.title: Onboarding Bitcoin and Lightning Developers
item.description: Introductions Introducer: 00:00:15 The next talk is going to be Onboarding Bitcoin and Lightning Developers with Will Clark, Gloria Zhao, Josie - Bitcoin Core contributor, Jonas Nick, please come to the stage. Pablo Fernandez: 00:00:32 Hey, guys, how are you doing? Welcome. So we are going to be talking about onboarding Bitcoin and Lightning developers. Do you guys want to introduce yourselves? I think all of you have been on stage already, but want to do a quick round?
